p: The data underlying figures 3â€“ 7 can be obtained from S.I.S. ( sonia.seneviratne@ethz.ch) and R.W. ( richard.wartenburger@env.ethz.ch). The IAM land-use maps underlying figures 11 and 12 can be obtained from the GCAM ( katherine.calvin@pnnl.gov), IMAGE ( IMAGE-info@pbl.nl), MESSAGE-GLOBIOM ( havlikpt@iiasa.ac.at, krisztin@iiasa.ac.at) and REMIND-MAgPIE ( popp@pik-potsdam.de) modelling teams. Electronic supplementary material is available online at rs.figshare.com.
